statements: SELECT * FROM Visitors WHERE age > 25;
SELECT name, age FROM Visitors WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT visitor_id, name, location FROM Visitors WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Visitors WHERE interests LIKE '%travel%';
SELECT visitor_id, name, email FROM Visitors WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 30 ORDER BY visitor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Visitors WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY name ASC, email DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT visitor_id, name, email FROM Visitors WHERE location = 'New York' AND interests LIKE '%sports%'
SELECT * FROM Visitors WHERE gender = 'Female' AND (age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 OR (location = 'California' AND interests LIKE '%music%')) ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT name, gender, location FROM Visitors WHERE interests LIKE '%food%' AND (age < 25 OR gender = 'Male') GROUP BY gender, location
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM Visitors WHERE age >= 25 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM visitor_information;
SELECT visitor_name, age, email FROM visitor_information ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT visitor_name, gender, phone_number FROM visitor_information WHERE age > 30;
SELECT visitor_id, preferred_activities, dietary_restrictions FROM visitor_preferences WHERE guide_requested = true;
SELECT DISTINCT location_id FROM visitor_information;
SELECT * FROM visitor_information WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY visitor_name DESC;

SELECT visitor_name, age, email FROM visitor_information INNER JOIN visitor_preferences ON visitor_information.visitor_id = visitor_preferences.visitor_id WHERE fitness_level = 'Intermediate' AND guide_requested = TRUE;
SELECT visitor_name, gender, phone_number FROM visitor_information WHERE location_id = 3 AND age < 45 ORDER BY visitor_name;

SELECT visitor_name, dietary_restrictions, lodging_preferences FROM visitor_information LEFT JOIN visitor_preferences ON visitor_information.visitor_id = visitor_preferences.visitor_id WHERE allergies NOT LIKE '%peanuts%' AND lodging_preferences = 'Cabin';
SELECT visitor_name, age, email FROM visitor_information WHERE gender = 'Female' AND (age < 30 OR age > 50) ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Visitors;
SELECT visitor_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Visitors WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT visitor_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM Visitors WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT visitor_id, email, country, created_at FROM Visitors ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT v.visitor_id, v.first_name, v.last_name, vs.visit_date FROM Visitors v JOIN Visits vs ON v.visitor_id = vs.visitor_id WHERE vs.duration_hours > 3;
SELECT * FROM Visitors;
SELECT visitor_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Visitors ORDER BY visitor_id DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, first_name, last_name, country FROM Visitors WHERE country='USA';
SELECT visitor_id, first_name, last_name, total_cost FROM Visitors LEFT JOIN Visits ON Visitors.visitor_id = Visits.visitor_id;
SELECT visitor_id, first_name, last_name, nature_lover FROM Visitors JOIN Preferences ON Visitors.visitor_id = Preferences.visitor_id WHERE nature_lover=true;
SELECT * FROM VisitorInformation;
SELECT visitor_id, name, age, country FROM VisitorInformation;
SELECT visitor_id, email, gender FROM VisitorInformation WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM EcotourismExperiences ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT experience_id, location, price FROM EcotourismExperiences WHERE price < 100.00;
SELECT * FROM VisitorInformation WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, email FROM VisitorInformation WHERE country = 'USA' AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM VisitorPreferences WHERE preference_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY preference_name
SELECT * FROM EcotourismExperiences WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY price DESC

SELECT VisitorInformation.name, EcotourismExperiences.location, CustomerSatisfaction.satisfaction_rating FROM VisitorInformation JOIN CustomerSatisfaction ON VisitorInformation.visitor_id = CustomerSatisfaction.visitor_id JOIN EcotourismExperiences ON CustomerSatisfaction.experience_id = EcotourismExperiences.experience_id WHERE VisitorInformation.country = 'Canada'
SELECT * FROM Visitors;
SELECT visitor_name, visitor_country FROM Visitors WHERE visitor_age > 18;
SELECT visitor_name, visitor_email, visitor_age FROM Visitors ORDER BY visitor_age DESC;
SELECT visitor_name, visitor_country FROM Visitors WHERE visitor_country = 'USA';
SELECT DISTINCT visitor_country FROM Visitors;
SELECT * FROM Visitors ORDER BY visitor_name DESC, visitor_country ASC;
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_name, visitor_age FROM Visitors WHERE visitor_age > 30 AND visitor_country = 'USA';
SELECT visitor_name, visitor_email, preference_type, preference_description FROM Visitors JOIN Preferences ON Visitors.visitor_id = Preferences.visitor_id;

SELECT visitor_name, activity_name, booking_date FROM Visitors JOIN Bookings ON Visitors.visitor_id = Bookings.visitor_id JOIN Activities ON Bookings.activity_id = Activities.activity_id WHERE booking_status = 'confirmed';

SELECT visitor_name, activity_name, feedback.rating, feedback.comments FROM Visitors JOIN Feedback ON Visitors.visitor_id = Feedback.visitor_id JOIN Activities ON Feedback.activity_id = Activities.activity_id WHERE feedback.rating = 5;
